SENTENCE.STRING: , officially the Republic of Mozambique (Portuguese: Moçambique or República de Moçambique, pron.

'βi.k(ɨ)]), is a country in southeastern Africa bordering to the Indian Ocean in the east, Tanzania in the north, Malawi and Zambia in the northwest, Zimbabwe in the west and Swaziland and South Africa in the southwest.
is a member of the Community of Portuguese Language Countries and the Commonwealth of Nations.
